title: Homestead Rescue
resume: Expert homesteader, Marty Raney, along with his daughter Misty and son Matt, give struggling families a second chance at surviving off-the-grid.  The stakes are high, but the Raney family is determined to prepare these families for nature’s worst and set them up for success.
